comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

HP provides the "hpijs" driver for this printer; it produces excellent photo and text output, the "gimp-print", "pcl3", and "cdj880" drivers all work fairly well, too.

To get its maximum quality, use the "hpijs" driver.

Same hardware as HP DeskJet 895Cse and 895Cxi.

USB is rumored to not work, but it is unclear why or what the problem was.
